TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit DebuggerStepThroughAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public NotInheritable Class DebuggerStepThroughAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class DebuggerStepThroughAttribute sealed : Attribute

summary.span: 指示偵錯工具逐步執行程式碼，而不要進入程式碼。

span.span: Instructs the debugger to step through the code instead of stepping into the code.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性會提供以用由來源的程式碼偵錯工具。common language runtime 不會受到它。This attribute is provided for use by source code debuggers; the common language runtime is not affected by it. 例如，Visual Studio 偵錯工具不會停止在即使在方法中設定中斷點，以這個屬性標記的方法。For example, the Visual Studio debugger does not stop in a method that is marked with this attribute even if a breakpoint is set in the method. 屬性會影響[Just My Code](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0f0df097-bbaf-46ad-9ad1-ef5f40435079) Visual Studio 以下列方式 (JMC) 功能：The attribute affects the [Just My Code](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0f0df097-bbaf-46ad-9ad1-ef5f40435079) (JMC) feature of Visual Studio in the following ways: - 如果啟用 jmc 的方法時，Visual Studio 偵錯工具不會停止在以標記的方法中的中斷點屬性。If JMC is enabled, the Visual Studio debugger will not stop at a breakpoint in a method marked with the attribute. - 即使方法標示為已停用 jmc 的方法，偵錯工具停在中斷點。If JMC is disabled, the debugger stops at the breakpoint even if the method is marked with the . 下列程式碼會示範 Visual Basic 編譯器如何使用屬性。The following code shows how the Visual Basic compiler uses the attribute. ``` _ Private Sub InitializeComponent() components = New System.ComponentModel.Container() Me.AutoScaleMode = System.Windows.Forms.AutoScaleMode.Font Me.Text = "Form1" End Sub ``` 這個屬性可避免必須逐步執行至編譯器提供的程式碼和開發人員提供的程式碼的唯一步驟。This attribute avoids having to step into compiler-provided code and only steps into developer-provided code. 例如，如果您已逐步執行程式碼使用**F11** （逐步執行） 索引鍵屬性會導致的行為類似的步驟**F10** （不進入函式） 索引鍵編譯器提供的程式碼。For example, if you are stepping through code by using the **F11** (Step Into) key, the attribute will cause the step to behave like an **F10** (Step Over) key for compiler-provided code. 此方法不會逐步執行，但將會執行。The method won’t be stepped into, but it will be executed. 如需屬性用法的詳細資訊，請參閱[屬性](~/docs/standard/attributes/index.md)。For more information about using attributes, see [Attributes](~/docs/standard/attributes/index.md).

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.
